abstract: A day after HSBC issued its first-ever profit warning, the bank’s chief executive started a management shake-up at the American consumer finance unit where losses from home loans to high-risk borrowers increased more than expected last year.
lead_paragraph: A day after HSBC issued its first-ever profit warning, the bank’s chief executive started a management shake-up at the American consumer finance unit where losses from home loans to high-risk borrowers increased more than expected last year.

headline.main: Losses in Home Loans Prompt HSBC to Shake Up Management of Unit
